column1: The Pit Room////Small BBQ joint serving some of the best BBQ in all of Houston! The two meat platter is the way to go. The vinegar cole slaw and potato salad or beans are excellent sides. Yes
column2: the parking lot is small and there can be lines at times
column3: but this BBQ has some of the best flavor that you can find. Next time I am in Houston
column4: I am making it a point to visit The Pit Room and get some more BBQ.
